feed.title: Category: Katamari Damacy | MECHAkunEX Media Diary

entry.title: Game: Katamari Damacy (PS2, 2004)
entry.content:
After Final Fantasy 13, I wanted to play something really light. Katamari Damacy was a good choice. It's crazy, bizarre, and really fun. I've heard a lot about it over the past few years and I was glad to be able to try it out.

I really like the way you collect countries in the ending sequence. It's funny.
